input.sentences: these friends have gathered to shoot off rockets in the snowy mountains .
throw a few snowballs at them .
output.sentences: On a snowy day, a man will shoot a rocket into the air.
He sets the rockets into place for launch.
His team pauses to throw snowballs.
The rocket is now set onto the launchpad and ready to go.
The team will wait for the launch with a feeling of suspense.
